description: Coefficients arising in the enumeration of configurations of linear chains.
references: A. M. Nemirovsky et al., Marriage of exact enumeration and 1/d expansion methods: lattice model of dilute polymers, J. Statist. Phys., 67 (1992), 1083-1108; see Eq 4b.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 02 2000
